title: Eni closes acquisition of Dogger Bank stake
lead: The Italian oil and gas major has purchased a 20% share in Dogger Bank A and B

title: Sainsbury’s to sponsor COP26
lead: The retailer becomes the sixth Principal Partner for the international climate change summit in Glasgow

title: Drax starts planning process to build bioenergy with CCS plants
lead: The company has started the application to build BECCS units as soon as 2024

title: ENA brings more flexibility to the grid with contract update
lead: A new contract aims to offer more liquidity in local markets and bring energy bills down

title: Plans for ‘England’s first’ poo-powered heating scheme unveiled
lead: More than 2,000 homes in Kingston could soon be heated using sewage

title: Thames Water fined £2.3m for raw sewage pollution
lead: More than 1,100 fish died after untreated sewage was released into a local stream in 2016

title: World Bank debars German oil and gas contractor for 13 months
lead: The debarment makes Ferrostall Oil & Gas ineligible to participate in projects and operations financed by institutions of the World Bank Group for the stated period

title: Nepal to cut carbon emissions from deforestation with $45m support
lead: The Emissions Reductions Payment Agreement is expected to help reduce nine million tons of carbon emissions in the Terai Arc Landscape

title: Shell eyes synthetic kerosene production for greener air travel
lead: The energy major will use renewable electricity and biomass to produce the fuel

title: Bulb-led coalition to create Tech Zero taskforce
lead: Net zero commitments, low carbon investments and green customer motivations will be among the priorities of the group
